title: Efflux Watch Face
summary: A simple watch face with aminimalistic design.
description: How it works:There are 3 white rings on the canvas. Every ring means 15 min. When the hour begins a line starts growing from the center of the canvas and  at 15, 30, 45 and 60 min it reaches a ring. Every filled line is an hour.Bugs and other problems:This software has not been tested on a real device, only on the emulator. There could be bugs what I didn't had on the emulator test run. If you find one then feel free to inform me about it and I will fix it.
descriptionHTML:
How it works:

There are 3 white rings on the canvas. Every ring means 15 min. When the hour begins a line starts growing from the center of the canvas and at 15, 30, 45 and 60 min it reaches a ring. Every filled line is an hour.

Bugs and other problems:

This software has not been tested on a real device, only on the emulator. There could be bugs what I didn't had on the emulator test run. If you find one then feel free to inform me about it and I will fix it.
comments: Innovative but boring on dim Love the idea. The colour is now fixed but is still grey in dim mode? Is that by design, I'd like it to be the colour all the time, or an option to choose the dim mode colour because grey is v dull. Also,  the hour hand grows grey before changing colour which looks odd. Then I think it would be 5 stars. Thx. Re reply,  perhaps an option and grey by default would still fit spec? Is that possible?
Works great. Works as described. I agree it would be better to have color in dim mode.
No app I downloded but cannot find the app...and in the play store there is only option to uninstall....i cannot find th icon and cannot open from play store.
recentChanges: - Colors are now working. Doesn't stuck anymore in ambient mode.
